reviews.title: Sturdy build, Decent price
reviews.date: Reviewed in India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ on 23 March 2023
reviews.text: Buying for the third time for my parents phone(purchased from physical store for 500/- each time and now online). These have averaged over 1.5 years with over 6-7 hours of everyday use and it is truly rough and tough / careless usage (pulling on the wire, swinging ear buds hitting floor and bouncing back at times kinda use.) Decent build quality and good sound, mic quality with good warranty support makes it a decent and worthy purchase. Not for audiophiles though. This is the default "that'll do" product from a trusted brand.EDIT : Received Feb 2023 make product. Thickness of wire have reduced overtime but this is the first time I am purchasing this online. Everything else feels ok. I really hope it's the genuine product.

reviews.title: BEWARE! Not all colours have mics.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ on 27 August 2020
reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my youngest two kids because I wanted them to have a mic in case they had to go back to online schooling. We received them a couple days ago the blue ones have no mic. They have the same part # and are part of the same item in Amazon. When shopping I looked at the pink ones first, which have a mic and then added the blue ones for my son. While I see now that the blue ones have a different description it never occurred to me that they would have different options as they're the same listing and have the same part #. The headphones themselves are nice and the quality seems fine (time will tell) but super frustrating.

reviews.title: Bought multiple and they broke after 4-6 months. The service was outstanding however
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ on 10 April 2021
reviews.text: I bought this model for my 3 kids, then one of them stop working after a few months. I suspected that my kid may have been the issue, or they dropped it, so I bought a replacement. I can say that within 6 months they all failed and suffer from the same issue. The connection to the headset breaks after a while, regardless of their usage. I can't stress this enough, those headphone were not abused or misused. They all start failing about the same time. At first one of the ear isnt working, then a few weeks later it both stops.At 30ish $ and branded for kids, I expected a lot more. I can't understand how this product got a 9000+ positive review, in my experience this was a waste of money.Updated â€”â€”â€”I got an email about my unfortunate experience and got a chance to evaluate this product once again. I must say that I am truly impressed by this gesture as they have replaced all my faulty headphones with new ones. So far so good, i will update this again after a few months and see if the units still works.

reviews.title: Great Product & Excellent Customer Service
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ on 30 August 2020
reviews.text: Update - We bought these for our daughter and she loves them comfort wise. She is six and they fit her perfectly and comfortably. She will wear them on longer drives when she would not wear others. I like the volume controlled for little ears. Our first pair had a problem of static around the cord connection which is a common headphone problem which I thought might be mitigated by the soft cord. When I contacted customer service about it, they responded immediately and sent out a new pair so quickly that we were a little surprised. Great communication, great service, and we are back to having the comfy headphones we wanted. Thanks so much!

reviews.title: stopped working within a month but I was refunded
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ on 18 July 2020
reviews.text: My daughter loved these headphones - they fit perfectly and she really enjoyed that they were made for her but they stopped working within a month of purchase and there was no way other than leaving a bad review to contact the seller. They did offer to replace the item but it took enough time that I had already replaced it with another brand - which my daughter doesn't love quite as much. My daughter was really disappointed when it stopped working.  I must have just gotten a dud product as the seller stands by their product and will refund or replace if it doesn't work.

reviews.title: Product Update: Volume Button Doesn't Work
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ on 15 November 2022
reviews.text: The headphones are soft and comfortable. The fit is good however the volume button doesn't work. Sound is adequate even with the faulty button.Update: The company reached out to me and offered to send another headset. Now that's great customer service. They arrived within days and work great.Thank you so much!

reviews.title: Best under 2000/-
reviews.date: Reviewed in India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ on 27 June 2022
reviews.text: Pros  ------Amazing battery life lasts easily a week on heavy usage, it's been a month since I purchased these headphones I just charged them 2 times, not particularly for gaming but u can play games just fine. Connects with pc with no latency in valorant, but noticed latency in pubg. (Latency is not an issue with a iPhone,but Androids ðŸ¥²)  and very comfortable also used them in train for 3.5 hours.Cons -------- full charging time is too much 4.5 hours ( not an issue with me overnight charging ðŸ‘Œ)Your own voice repeats on ðŸ¤™ call ( it's a feature  by Sony and I like it )It's sometimes  disconnects and reconnects for a split second (rarely)Range ------ it's not that great 10-20 metres also depends on the location.Conclusion ---- for 1800/- they are bang for the buck
